head.supplied: 25/2/64 ¶ Dear Mr Eaton ¶ ¶ Mr Bosisto, who is Councillor for Richmond & has besides to superintend his large distilleries of Eucalyptus oil, writes to me that he can not undertake more public duties...

div.p: MS 11663 Royal Society of Victoria records, box 2/2, La Trobe Australian Manuscripts Collection, State Library of Victoria, Melbourne.

Mr Bosisto, who is Councillor for Richmond & has besides to superintend his large distilleries of Eucalyptus oil, writes to me that he can not undertake more public duties & hence will not allow himself to be placed in nomination for a Councillorship of our R.S.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: I send herewith a cheque for the R.S. from Sam. Wilson Esq of the Wimmera & will relieve you of the necessity of acknowledging this contribution as well as Mr Bosistos.
